## Origin

- C7-T3 SP @gilroyAtlasAnatomy2020

## Insertion
2-4th ribs (sup border) @gilroyAtlasAnatomy2020

## Innervation
[Spinal nn. ]({{< var ref-spinal-nerves.path >}}) T2-T5 (Ant ramus) @gilroyAtlasAnatomy2020

## Action

Elevates ribs
